title: Sampler, 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on wool
Technique: back, double running and satin stitches on plain weave
provenance: ex. coll. Mrs. Henry E. Coe (Eva Johnston Coe)
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 33 x 31 cm (13 x 12 3/16 in.)
creditline: Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe
description: Verse; human figures; baskets of flowers, birds and trees; within a border of flowers.
